entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 5:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
